name: PolyStrike (zarat) (zarat)
description:
A simple p2p multiplayer shooter made with unity.

Press the "m" key to choose a map. Press the "l" key to show a list of players and their points. Spin the mousewheel to select weapons. Press the "r" key to reload. Have fun.

Visit the project at github
https://github.com/zarat/PolyStrike
